3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\admin\popo;
4 
5 class Route {
6  private $path;
7  private $controller;
8  private $action;
9  private $parameters=[];
10  private $cache;
11  private $duration;
12  private $name;
13  private $methods;
14  private $id;
15  private $messages;
16 
17  public function __construct($path="",$array=[]){
18  if(isset($array['controller'])){
19  $this->messages=[];
20  $this->path=$path;
21  $this->methods=$array['methods']??'';
22  $this->fromArray($array);
23  $this->id=\uniqid();
24  }
25  }
26 
27  private static function mergeRouteArray($routeArrays){
28  $response=[];
29  foreach ($routeArrays as $method=>$route){
30  $routeName=$route['name'];
31  if(!isset($response[$routeName])){
32  $response[$routeName]=$route;
33  }
34  $response[$routeName]['methods'][]=$method;
35  }
36  return $response;
37  }
38 
39  private function fromArray($array){
40  $this->controller=$array["controller"];
41  $this->action=$array["action"];
42  $this->name=isset($array["name"])?$array["name"]:'';
43  $this->cache=isset($array["cache"])?$array["cache"]:false;
44  $this->duration=isset($array["duration"])?$array["duration"]:false;
45  if(isset($array["parameters"]) && \sizeof($array["parameters"])>0){
46  if(\class_exists($this->controller)){
47  if(\method_exists($this->controller, $this->action)){
48  $method=new \ReflectionMethod($this->controller,$this->action);
49  $params=$method->getParameters();
50  foreach ($array["parameters"] as $paramIndex){
51  if($paramIndex==="*"){
52  $pName=$this->getVariadicParam($params);
53  if($pName!==false){
54  $this->parameters[]="...".$pName;
55  }
56  }else{
57  $index=\intval(\str_replace("~", "", $paramIndex));
58  if(isset($params[$index])){
59  if(\substr($paramIndex,0,1)==="~")
60  $this->parameters[]=$params[$index]->getName();
61  else
62  $this->parameters[]=$params[$index]->getName()."*";
63  }
64  }
65  }
66  }else{
67  $this->messages[]="The method <b>".$this->action."</b> does not exists in the class <b>".$this->controller."</b>.\n";
68  }
69  }else{
70  $this->messages[$this->controller]="The class <b>".$this->controller."</b> does not exist.\n";
71  }
72  }
73  }
74  private function getVariadicParam($parameters){
75  foreach ($parameters as $param){
76  if($param->isVariadic()){
77  return $param->getName();
78  }
79  }
80  return false;
81  }
82

84  return $this->path;
85  }
86

88  $this->path=$path;
89  return $this;
90  }

145 
146  public function getCompiledParams(){
147  return " (".((\is_array($this->parameters))?\implode(", ", $this->parameters):$this->parameters).")";
148  }
149 
150  public static function init($array){
151  $result=[];
152  foreach ($array as $k=>$v){
153  if(isset($v['controller'])){
154  $result[]=new Route($k, $v);
155  }else{
156  $routes=self::mergeRouteArray($v);
157  foreach ($routes as $route){
158  $result[]=new Route($k,$route);
159  }
160  }
161  }
162  return $result;
163  }

166  return $this->id;
167  }
